name: BAI YUN® Black Waterproof Window And Door Silicone Sealant External Wall Sealer
description: BAI YUN® Black Waterproof Window And Door Silicone Sealant External Wall Sealer SS804 Silicone Joint Sealant is a one-component, neutral curing, general-purpose construction silicone sealant with good adhesion to glass, aluminum, cement, concrete etc., specially designed for sealing in all type of doors, windows, and wall joints.
